channel.title: CVE Feed for Phoenix Contact -- Automation Worx
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Phoenix Contact -- Automation Worx

item.title: CVE-2020-12498|2024-08-04T11:56:52.080Z -- phoenix%20contact -- automation%20worx
item.description: mwe file parsing in Phoenix Contact PC Worx and PC Worx Express version 1.87 and earlier is vulnerable to out-of-bounds read remote code execution. Manipulated PC Worx projects could lead to a remote code execution due to insufficient input data validation.

item.title: CVE-2020-12497|2024-08-04T11:56:52.059Z -- phoenix%20contact -- automation%20worx
item.description: PLCopen XML file parsing in Phoenix Contact PC Worx and PC Worx Express version 1.87 and earlier can lead to a stack-based overflow. Manipulated PC Worx projects could lead to a remote code execution due to insufficient input data validation.
